reviews.review: Отличная игра которая подарила мне не одну тысячу часов, частые обновления новые карты новые персонажи новые механики.
Цепляет с первых минут , классная игра , разработчики работают над игрой , всегда что то новое в ней, надеюсь,так будет всегда
Игра помойка, удалите и верните деньги
MNAM
piola man

OK time to do a thing and start bitching.

The ranking system in it's current form is dog shit. You can play as a 4 man squad, with 3 rank reds and 1 grey rank. You'll go against... Can you guess? Purple ranks? NO you can go as deep as yellow or green. That is a thing. 

You could get 3 friends to buy the game with you, or go solo queue. You might survive along with some Claudettes and/or dweets in a corner or P3 Bills looping and rushing gens. If it's in your rank area, in it goes! All the algorithm cares about. I know, It's hard making these things work properly.

The only way you can tell if a player is good in the ingame lobby is either by cosmetics or by public play hours. And sometimes they might wear default clothing. If I would suggest something into the game, it would be an ingame profile. It could say things like highest character, or level + devotion, death/escape ratio, highest rank they've been at or anything else that fits.

Game was fun in the begining, but there is not much else to do, new killers are annoying and should be nerfed, maps are getting kind of improved but nothing new, the dlcs are moneygrabs, you already paid for the game atleast make a seasonpass or earnable ingame funds that u can pay for new killers with without massive amount of grinding. The game was fun at one point but it gets really boring. Try something else if u are looking for a good horror survival multiplayer game like: pacify or phasmphobia this aint a game u shoud spend money on and it feels like the playerbase is dying.

This game had great potential but is just too wack

Some matches are amazing, I don't care if I die as long as I had a fun time. Some matches are **** with face campers, tunnelers, t-baggers, surive with friend with purple keys and all that stuff. But most matches (survivor and killer) are fun and challenging. Every match has it's own + and -'s for example maps, killers, add-ons, offerings and the people you play with and against. So overall a fun and tactical game I enjoy playing alone and with friends.
It is a nice grinding game where the 4 survivor must repair 5 generators to escape. Very funny to play with friends. No friends? dont care
